title: Introduction to Programming Slides
description: Lecture slides covering basic programming concepts, variables, control structures, and functions.

ratings.comment: Good content, but could use more examples.

title: Python Basics Tutorial
description: Step-by-step tutorial on Python basics including examples and practice exercises.

title: Data Structures Cheat Sheet
description: Quick reference for common data structures with time complexity analysis.

title: Algorithm Visualization Tools
description: Collection of online tools to visualize algorithm execution.

ratings.comment: These visualizations helped me understand algorithms much better!

title: Marketing Case Studies
description: Collection of real-world marketing case studies for analysis.

title: Academic Writing Guidelines
description: Comprehensive guide on academic writing standards and best practices.

title: Digital Logic Design Lab Exercises
description: Practice exercises for digital circuit design and simulation.

ratings.comment: Good exercises, helped with the practical aspects.
